Method Detail

startPayment

PaymentProcess startPayment(java.lang.String sessionIdentifier,
                            AccessoryFamily accessoryFamily,
                            PaymentProcessListener listener)
Starts and returns a new payment process which guide you through a complete transaction. This method is used if the session has already been created on the backend.

Parameters:
sessionIdentifier - The sessionIdentifier of the transaction to start
accessoryFamily - The kind of accessory you want to use for the transaction
listener - The listener that receives updates during processing.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the PaymentProcess already processes a transaction
Since:
2.2.0

startPayment

PaymentProcess startPayment(TransactionTemplate template,
                            AccessoryFamily accessoryFamily,
                            PaymentProcessWithRegistrationListener listener)
Starts and returns a new payment process which guide you through a complete transaction. This method registers the transaction locally without requiring a backend for this.

Parameters:
template - The transaction template to start.
accessoryFamily - The kind of accessory you want to use for the transaction.
listener - The listener that receives updates during processing.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the PaymentProcess already processes a transaction
Since:
2.2.0

createChargeTransactionTemplate

TransactionTemplate createChargeTransactionTemplate(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                                    Currency currency,
                                                    java.lang.String subject,
                                                    java.lang.String customIdentifier)
Creates a new template for a new transaction.

Parameters:
amount - The amount The amount of the transaction.
currency - The currency of the transaction.
subject - The subject of the transaction.
customIdentifier - The custom identifier of the transaction.
Returns:
A new transaction template that can be used to start a transaction locally.
Since:
2.2.0

createRefundTransactionTemplate

TransactionTemplate createRefundTransactionTemplate(java.lang.String referencedTransactionIdentifier,
                                                    java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                                    Currency currency,
                                                    java.lang.String subject,
                                                    java.lang.String customIdentifier)
Creates a new template, linking to a previous transaction.

Parameters:
referencedTransactionIdentifier - The transaction to reference.
amount - The amount of the transaction.
currency - The currency of the transaction.
subject - The subject of the transaction.
customIdentifier - The custom identifier of the transaction.
Returns:
A new transaction template that can be used to start a transaction locally.
Since:
2.2.0
